Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back SAVE UP TO 25% Anaheim Disneyland Park in California Disneyland tickets Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions Disneyland Two magical Theme Parks. One incredible shopping, dining and entertainment district. All within walking distance of one another, along with legendary Disney service and a generous helping of pixie dust! Now is the perfect time to turn an incredible holiday into the ultimate Southern California experience. Disneyland Park The one-and-only original! Wonders and memories abound in magical lands brimming with timeless attractions, outstanding entertainment, beloved Disney Characters and astonishing thrills galore! Touch down in a far away galaxy filled with epic adventures and your favourites from Star Wars! Must-See: Indiana Jones™ Adventure, Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, Matterhorn Bobsleds, Fantasmic!, Pirates of the Caribbean, ‘it’s a small world’, Big Thunder Mountain Railroad. Disneyland California Adventure Park More stories! More adventures! Explore seven exciting lands overflowing with immersive Disney, Pixar and Marvel attractions, entertainment and dining! Sensational surroundings, spectacular shows and pure Disney imagination offer thrills and adventure for everyone. Must-See: Soarin’ Around the World, Incredicoaster, Radiator Springs Racers, Guardians of the Galaxy - Mission: BREAKOUT!, World of Color. View more View less Sightseeing from $ 545 per person. Flights and accommodation are additional SAVE UP TO 25% Enquire now Sale Period : Until 4pm on 28 Feb 26 or until sold out Deal Includes: From $545 per adult/child for a 3 Day, 1-Park per day Disneyland ticket Adventure awaits From $695 per adult/child for a 3 Day Park Hopper Disneyland ticket From $715 per adult/child for a 3 Day 1 Park/Day with Lightning Lane Multi Pass Disneyland ticket From $859 per adult/child for a 3 Day Park Hopper with Lightning Lane Multi Pass Disneyland ticket Child age is 3-9 years old Valid for Park Admission through to 09 Oct 26 1 Park Per day Tickets mean you can spend the day in either Disneyland Park or Disney California Adventure Park. Park Hopper tickets mean you can enjoy both theme parks on the same day and move between the parks. Lightning Lane Multi Pass Allows: Ability to book lightning lanes passes for select attractions Enjoy unlimited Disney PhotoPass Digital Downloads The ability to listen to Disney audio tales during your visit, plus more! Ask us about what type of ticket suits your holiday best! Only at the Happiest Place on Earth for a short time? Ask about tickets for 2 days! Need longer? We can help with that too! Terms & Conditions Pricing correct as of 22 Oct 25, but subject to change due to currency fluctuations. Tickets valid for admission beginning 16 May 25 and expire 13 days after first day of use or on 09 Oct 26 whichever occurs first. These special prices are a promo valid for New Zealand and Australian residents, and valid proof of Australian or New Zealand residency, (including government-issued photo ID/Passport/licence), may be required at time of park admission. To enter a park, both a theme park reservation and a valid ticket for the same park on the same date is required. Theme park reservations are limited in number and subject to the availability of the park reservations allocated to the Ticket Offer as determined by Disney, block out dates and theme park capacity. Reservation availability is not guaranteed for any date and reservations may be difficult to get for any particular date, especially as the ticket expiration date approaches. To ensure best availability, make reservations early. Subject to restrictions and change or cancellation without notice. Sales may be paused from time to time or terminated at any time.
